title: Equality
body:
Just finished a game where a duo will fed if his girl doesn't get the support role, and when she did bad his only excuses was... wait for it...

"Hey fuck you man lux is a girl of course she is bad".

Hello Oce, its 2016.

replies.body:
Wasn't expecting her to be a Lux player.

http://res.cloudinary.com/urbandictionary/image/upload/a_exif,c_fit,h_200,w_200/v1395991705/gjn81wvxqsq6yzcwubok.png
I have no words. That's just horrible! How did everyone in the game respond to that?

Equality would be not giving her the role unless if in Blind Pick she called for it first, or in Dynamic she got it as her queue.

As for the boyfriend, let him feed. He'll get permabanned and can put up with it.
